task.title: How To Sum up Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instruction about using the addition feature of JPS Calculator app

context.p: To successfully sum up numbers, you must know what is addition.

taskbody.result: The result from the addition is displayed. You want to subtract 3 and 2. The equation will look like: 3+2=5. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals. The result 5 appears on the screen.
